text: Escola Internacional do Amazonas (Amazonas English Academy or International School of Amazonas) is an international school located in the Brazilian city of Manaus, which operates in the English language for students from two years six months up to 18 years.http://www.amazonasenglishacademy.com/index.html == References == == External links == *Amazonas English Academy Category:Schools in Manaus Category:British international schools Category:British international schools in Brazil Category:Secondary schools in Brazil Category:Education in Amazonas (Brazilian state)
title: International School of Amazonas
